title: Sweet jacket potatoes with vegetable chilli

ingredients.item: 200g pack Waitrose mixed romano peppers, seeded and sliced
395g can essential Waitrose red kidney beans in chilli sauce
20g essential Waitrose extra mature grated cheddar

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 190Â°C, gas mark 5. Bake the sweet potatoes for 50-55 minutes or until tender.
Meanwhile, spritz a frying pan with olive oil and cook the peppers and onion for 5 minutes until softened. Add the beans, cover, and simmer gently for 10 minutes.
Using a sharp knife, split the potatoes and spoon in the chilli mixture. Scatter over the cheese to serve.
